original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares edge up in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s shares edged up in mid day trade on Friday, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was up 0.32 percent or 35.35 points to 11,062.18, the most liquid index S&PSL20 was up 0.64 percent or 20.46 points to 3,225.62.
Top gainers were Sampath Bank, Melstacorp and DFCC Bank. (Colombo/July21/2023)
